solution_line_template: There are a total of {hats_per_bag} x {num_bags} = <<{hats_per_bag}*{num_bags}={total_hats_initial}>>{total_hats_initial} hats in {num_bags} bags.
Since {hats_torn} tore off, only {total_hats_initial} - {hats_torn} = <<{total_hats_initial}-{hats_torn}={hats_after_tear}>>{hats_after_tear} hats were left.
